params._currencies: Array of currency code hashes (e.g., keccak256("USD"), keccak256("EUR"))
Array of currency code hashes to support
params._paymentMethod: The payment method hash; Hash the payment method name in lowercase
params._verifier: The verifier address to add for this payment method

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._currencies: Array of currency code hashes to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addCurrencies(bytes32,bytes32[]).notice: Adds supported currencies for a specific payment method

addPaymentMethod(bytes32,address,bytes32.notice: Adds a new payment method with processors and currencies

removeCurrencies(bytes32,bytes32[]).notice: Removes supported currencies for a specific payment method

removePaymentMethod(bytes32).notice: Removes a payment method and associated configuration
